organizations.title: Team Helping Hands
organizations.description: With the help of some old friends made a group to help society in fighting the 2nd wave of Covid. Provided 100s of Oxygen Cylinders, required medicines, blood and plasma across all across Kanpur region. Some stories of our efforts were covered by various media houses. The team is still working to provide help to the Covid Patients as well as people with severe medical conditions.

organizations.title: Online Skill Exchange
organizations.description: In April 2020, during the Lockdown period due to Covid-19, with the help of my college batchmates and seniors, this group was formed to utilize free time with an aim is to exchange our skills and knowledge online. Around 50 people joined, participated and exchanged their skills. The idea is to bring people together into a group. Members of the group have certain skills they can teach to other members of the group. The Goal is to help and deliver some value to the members of this group.
